system.description: Connection - Roar of Time. The triggering effect does not affect the user, and effect's source is Flinched 5. Then user gains +6 EVA for 2 activations. When the user declares an Action or Ability that consumes at least one Simple Action, the user may spend 4 PP to reduce number of Simple Actions that Action consumes by 1 ([Exhaust] Actions instead just lose [Exhaust]) until the end of their Activation.
